original_title: Masters of the Tools of Ignorance
overview: Two generations of catchers strap on “the tools of ignorance” to share stories of intimidating hitters, violent home plate collisions, and catching legends like Sandy Koufax and Don Drysdale from the 1960s to the 1990s.
tagline: Two generations of pro catchers deliver a masterclass of secrets and stories to unlock the black art of catching.
title: Masters of the Tools of Ignorance
